text: "Langthabal Konung" () is an old royal palace in the Langthabal (Canchipur) region in the Imphal West district of Manipur. It served as the seat of administration of many rulers of Medieval Manipur.https://www.imphaltimes.com/news/item/4211-historic-langthabal-palace- turned-as-dumping-site/amp ==Related pages== * Sana Konung ==Further reading== * http://thepeopleschronicle.in/daily/english/484 ==Sources== * https://www.imphaltimes.com/news/item/4211-historic-langthabal-palace-turned- as-dumping-site/amp * http://e-pao.net/GP.asp?src=28..260613.jun13 * https://www.ixigo.com/langthabal-imphal-india-location-address-situated-map- ne-1123998 * https://www.ixigo.com/langthabal-imphal-india-ne-1123998 ==References== Category:Palaces in India
title: Langthabal Konung
